snippet: Three of Scotland's oldest universities have joined an exit from Britain's leading business lobby group after it registered to campaign against Scottish independence, saying they wanted to stay neutral in the increasingly fractious debate....

headline.print_headline: CBI Loses Members as Opposes Scottish Independence
headline.main: CBI Loses Members as Opposes Scottish Independence

lead_paragraph: Three of Scotland's oldest universities have joined an exit from Britain's leading business lobby group after it registered to campaign against Scottish independence, saying they wanted to stay neutral in the increasingly fractious debate.
